alert.note: Alert for Baker; Decatur; Miller; Seminole (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 12:42PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm with a possible funnel cloud will impact portions of north central Decatur, southeastern Miller, southwestern Baker and northeastern Seminole Counties through 130 PM EST... At 1241 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Donalsonville, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Donalsonville, Iron City, Brinson, Ausmac, Babcock, Davis Park, Little Hope, Lela, Eldorendo, Decatur Co A/P, Steinham Store, Boykin, Cyrene, Sharphagen, Donaldsonville A/P and Bellview. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of weak, brief funnel clouds. On rare occasions they can briefly touch down, producing wind gusts over 50 mph. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service.
